subject: In VisualAge, I cannot narrow nor cast the home interface
msgSnippet: Hi all, In Visual Age for Java I m now getting used to do my JUnit tests for the EJB we re developping. I m now facing a simple problem. My code crashes
messageBody:
Hi all,
In Visual Age for Java I'm now getting used to do my JUnit tests for the EJB we're developping. I'm now facing a simple problem. My code crashes whenever I try to narrow the remoteObject I received from the Context into the Home interface of my Bean ! Here is the code of my test :

<pre>
ic = new InitialContext(ContextMapFactory.create());
ObjRef = ic.lookup(TransactionRequestLogHome.JNDI_NAME);
try
{
home = (TransactionRequestLogHome)
PortableRemoteObject.narrow(
ObjRef,
TransactionRequestLogHome.class );
} catch(Exception e){
// ...
}
</pre>

Neither the narrowing nor the Casting does prevent the <code>ClassCastException</code>. Could someone tell me what the problem exactly is.


Tx,

Thomas,

p.s. : Among the things I did so far is to put the generated-jar containing the Home, Remote & Bean in the Classpath.
